Kráska z Ferihy urobila radikálne rozhodnutie: Sťahuje sa z Istanbulu
Neuveríte, kam to má obľúbená herečka namierené.
01 Nov 2019, 12:00 by jt
Dvadsaťsedemročná turecká herečka Gizem Karaca, ktorá v úspešnom romantickom seriáli Feriha stvánila Güneş, novú Emirovu lásku po smrti Ferihy, urobila radikálne rozhodnutie.
Rozhodla sa odsťahovať z rušného tureckého Istanbulu a spolu s manželom, obchodníkom  Kemalom Ekmekçim, za ktorého sa vydala pred dvoma rokmi, sa presťahovala na dedinu.
Herečka, ktorú ste mohli okrem Ferihy vidieť i v seriáli Nekonečná láska ako policajtku Mercan, odhalila tureckým médiám aj dôvod, prečo tak urobila. Ako prezradila v jednom z rozhovorov, našťastie netrpí syndrómom vyhorenia ani ničím podobným, len má jednoducho rada prírodu a život na vidieku.






Zdroj: Instagram/gizemkaraca
text:
Feriha's beauty made a radical decision: She is moving from Istanbul
You can't believe where your favorite actress is going.
Nov 01 2019, 12:00 by jt
Twenty-seven-year-old Turkish actress Gizem Karaca, who in the successful romantic series Feriha portrayed Güneş, Emir's new love after Feriha's death, made a radical decision.
She decided to move out of the bustling Turkish city of Istanbul and moved with her husband, the merchant Kemal Ekmekçi, whom she married two years ago, to a village.
The actress, which you could have seen in addition to Feriha in the series Infinite Love as a policewoman Mercan, also revealed to the Turkish media why she did so. Fortunately, as she revealed in one of the interviews, she does not suffer from burn-out syndrome or anything but simply likes nature and rural life.






Source: Instagram / gizemkaraca
